name: Space Shooter (itch) (MitcheZhouZhou)
description:
This is my shmup game I designed for exercise 3.

DOCUMENTATION

The player initially starts with a score of 0 and health of 100.

There are 3 different objects that the player can interact with

**All Collisions will lost 15 health **

1) Boss Enemy ship - 

  • The boss enemy can shoot yellow lasers at the player. Each hit from the boss will cause the player to lose 5 health.
  • Health: 10
  • Points Received After Destroying: 5
  • Source: https://opengameart.org/content/spaceship-fighter

2) Basic Enemy -

  • The Basic Enemy doesn't shoot at you. 
  • Health: 2
  • Points Received After Destroying: 1
  • Source: https://www.indiedb.com/games/lazer-20/images/spaceship-5

3) Asteroid -

  • Health: 2
  • Points Received After Destroying: 0
  • Source: https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/styles/medium/public/Asteroid%20Brown.png

Sound Credits:

Background Music: https://soundimage.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Automation.mp3

The following sounds were taken from : https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/arcade/?page=1

1) Shooting Sound: Quick Arcade Jump

2) Game Over: Arcade Retro Game Over

3) Explosion Sound: 8-Bit-Bomb Explosion
